metadata.title: CVE-2017-8786 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - negligible
metadata.description: pcre2test.c in PCRE2 10.23 allows remote attackers to cause a denial ofservice (heap-based buffer overflow) or possibly have unspecified otherimpact via a crafted regular expression.

criterions.comment: pcre2: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
